macros.sourceContext:
|
nsIDOMFile
|
> |

A number of non-standard methods have been removed from this interface. This affects the {{ domxref("File") }} object's {{ domxref("File.getDataAsUrl()") }} and {{ domxref("File.getAsBinary()") }} methods. However, this functionality can now be found in the standard {{ domxref("FileReader") }} object.

^ |
|

title: Updating extensions for Firefox 7
summary: This article offers advice for add-on developers that want to update their extensions to work in Firefox 7. Fortunately, most of the changes are relatively minor in this release, and few add-ons should need significant changes to work in Firefox 7.
pageTitle: Updating extensions for Firefox 7 - Mozilla | MDN
